content: this legal text provides an overview of the progress of a legal case without revealing the names of the parties involved the case begins with one party filing a complaint against the other outlining the issues and seeking a resolution the other party then responds either admitting or denying the allegations both parties exchange information and evidence through a process called discovery to gather facts for their case they may attempt to settle the dispute before trial but if no agreement is reached the case proceeds to trial where arguments and evidence are presented before a judge or jury after the trial a decision is made and if one party is unhappy they can file an appeal the text concludes by stating that the case is ongoing and provides a timeline for the next steps in the legal process the specific case mentioned involves a property dispute between coowners of a house in reggio calabria italy the court has granted the division of the property and the allocation of movable property among the parties the court also discusses legal interpretations regarding the dissolution of inheritance communities related to unauthorized buildings the courtappointed expert confirms irregularities in the propertys construction and determines that it violates urban planning regulations the court rejects the defendants argument to expunge the unauthorized buildings during the division of the property the court orders the defendant to pay litigation costs and assigns different lots to the parties involved the decision was made on march 30 2022 by judge dr gs
